0: Rooms are very clean and homey
The hotel is clean staff is tip top the rooms are large and well appointed
My room was clean and ready when I arrived at check in time
Very polite staff room was comfortable and quiet
The rooms are spacious very clean the bow dryer was broken and brought us a new one right away
The view was fantastic over looking the pool and amenity areas
The large bathroom was very clean and had plenty of counter space
Fantastic hotel with a great view of the city
1: No bottles of water in the room and poor menu selection for romService
Food in the one dining room was expensive and appalling
Post Harvey renovation made public areas and conference facilities nice and modern but rooms are still really dated
Very limited options for 24 hr room service boasts
This is silly and should be included in the cost of the room
For the amount we were paying I did not even check to see if the room came with a fridge
Room service took between an hour to an hour and a half and even refused service one time because they had too much work already unacceptable
One person can not watch TV in the living room without disturbing someone sleeping in the bedroom
The lobby and gym are nice but the rooms are VERY outdated and a bit gross
My bathroom had not been cleaned because someones hair was all over the shower when I got into the room
